content: row 7 row 9 side a k1 k5 yo ssk p7 to last st k1 row 10 side b repeat row 9 directions cast on 58 st or a multiple of 14 + 2 set-up row k all stitches work row 1-10 of lace pattern 47 times or as many times as desired ending row k all stitches bind off all stitches pattern & images © 2021 laura evans page 2 reversible zigzag eyelet lace scarf finishing weave in ends wet block stretching scarf somewhat aggressively to open up the lace pattern pattern & images © 2021 laura evans page 3
